TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlObjectSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于将对象序列化为 XML 流或文档的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class used to serialize objects as XML streams or documents.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展 以创建自己的序列化器来序列化和反序列化对象。Extend the to create your own serializer to serialize and deserialize objects. 类和 类都继承自 ，并且用于序列化和反序列化符合数据协定规则的对象（使用 和 创建的对象）。Both the class and the class inherit from the and are used to serialize and deserialize objects that conform to data contract rules (objects created using the and the ). ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名为 `WriteObjectWithInstance` 的方法，它包含一个 作为参数。The following example shows a method named `WriteObjectWithInstance` that includes an as a parameter. 该方法通过调用 方法来将 或 用于对象序列化。The method serializes an object using either the or by calling the method. [!code-csharp[XmlObjectSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xmlobjectserializer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlObjectSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xmlobjectserializer/vb/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 正在序列化的类型不符合数据协定规则。

span.span: the type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules.

exception.span: 例如， 特性未应用于该类型。

span.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

exception.span: 正在序列化的实例有问题。

span.span: there is a problem with the instance being serialized.

para.span: 从 继承时，必须重写以下成员：、、。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , .

para.span: 此外，必须实现 和 方法，以用于读取和反序列化。

span.span: Additionally, the and methods must be implemented for reading and deserializing.

MemberSignature.Value: protected XmlObjectSerializer ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: XmlObjectSerializer();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数标记为受保护以允许派生类链接构造函数。This constructor is marked protected to allow derived classes to chain constructors.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定序列化程序是否可以读取对象。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the serializer can read the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查读取器是否定位于要读取的元素，如果该元素是 XML 流或文档中找到的对象的顶级元素，则返回 `true`。This method checks whether the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 若要返回 `true`，找到的元素必须有期望的名称。To return `true`, the found element must have an expected name. 实际的期望元素名取决于序列化器的实现。The actual expected element name depends on the implementation of the serializer. 利用 ，开始元素在扩展类的构造函数中指定。With the , the starting element is specified in the constructor of the extension class. 有关示例，请参见 类的构造函数。For an example, see the constructors for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsStartObject (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader reader);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsStartObject(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader reader) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsStartObject (reader As XmlDictionaryReader) As Boolean
public: abstract bool IsStartObject(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReader ^ reader);

param.name: reader
param.span: 一个用于读取 XML 流或文档的 。

span.span: An used to read the XML stream or document.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 是否定位于可读取的 XML 元素上。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is positioned over an XML element that can be read.

returns.span: 如果读取器可读取数据则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the reader can read the data; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查读取器是否定位于要读取的元素，如果该元素是 XML 流或文档中找到的对象的顶级元素，则返回 `true`。This method checks if the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 实现决定何时返回 `true`。The implementation determines when to return `true`. 实现可以检查它们是否定位于某个元素或者查找期望的元素名。Implementations may check that they are positioned on an element or look for an expected element name. 的一个实现是 ，它检查是否定位于某个元素，并且还检查该元素名是否是当前反序列化的类型的顶级期望的名称。One implementation of the , the , checks that it is positioned on an element and also checks that the element name is the top level expected name for the type currently being deserialized. 如果需要，在使用 方法读取 XML 内容之前，可在定位于顶级元素时读取 XML 流中的附加属性。If needed, additional attributes in the XML stream can be read while positioned on the top level element before reading XML contents using the method.

Public Overridable Function IsStartObject (reader As XmlReader) As Boolean
public: virtual bool IsStartObject(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader);

param.span: 一个用于读取 XML 流或文档的 。

span.span: An used to read the XML stream or document.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 是否定位于可读取的 XML 元素上。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is positioned over an XML element that can be read.

returns.span: 如果读取器定位于开始元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the reader is positioned over the starting element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查读取器是否定位于要读取的元素，如果该元素是 XML 流或文档中找到的对象的顶级元素，则返回 `true`。This method checks whether the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 若要返回 `true`，找到的元素必须有期望的名称。To return `true`, the found element must have an expected name. 实际的期望元素名取决于序列化器的实现。The actual expected element name depends on the implementation of the serializer. 利用 ，开始元素在扩展类的构造函数中指定。With the , the starting element is specified in the constructor of the extension class. 有关示例，请参见 类的构造函数。For an example, see the constructors for the class.

summary.span: 读取一个 XML 文档或文档流，并返回反序列化的对象。

span.span: Reads an XML document or document stream and returns the deserialized object.

param.span: 用于读取 XML 流或文档的 。

span.span: A used to read the XML stream or document.

summary.span: 使用 读取 XML 流或文档，然后返回反序列化的对象。

span.span: Reads the XML stream or document with a and returns the deserialized object.
The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为虚拟方法，并且有一个默认实现，该实现创建一个字典读取器以读取基础流并将其反序列化。This method is a virtual method, and has a default implementation that creates a dictionary reader to read the underlying stream and deserialize it. 默认实现假设流为文本或 XML。The default implementation assumes the stream is text or XML.

span.span: Reads the XML document or stream with an and returns the deserialized object.

The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `verifyObjectName` 参数使用与 方法相同的代码来确定该元素是否是对象的开始位置。The `verifyObjectName` parameter uses the same code as the method to determine whether the element is the start of the object.

summary.span: 将结束 XML 元素写入 XML 流或文档。

span.span: Writes the closing XML element to an XML stream or document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须实现 、 和 方法。The , , and methods must be implemented. 三个方法连续使用以利用下面的模式写入完整的序列化：写入开始、写入内容和写入结束。The three methods are used in succession to write the complete serialization using the pattern: write start, write content, and write end. 写入对象期间，用户可在对 和对 的调用之间插入 XML 属性。Users can insert XML attributes during the writing of the object between the calls to and . 这三个方法也由 方法的虚拟实现调用。The three methods are also called by the virtual implementation of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须实现 、 和 方法。The , , and methods must be implemented. 三个方法连续使用以利用下面的模式写入完整的序列化：写入开始、写入内容和写入结束。The three methods are used in succession to write the complete serialization using the pattern: write start, write content, and write end. 如果该实现使用 XML 元素写入，可在写入对象内容之前插入属性。If the implementation writes using XML elements, attributes can be inserted before writing the contents of the object. 这三个方法也由 方法的虚拟实现调用。The three methods are also called by the virtual implementation of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void WriteStartObject (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter writer, object graph);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteStartObject(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter writer, object graph) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub WriteStartObject (writer As XmlDictionaryWriter, graph As Object)
public: abstract void WriteStartObject(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryWriter ^ writer, System::Object ^ graph);

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于写入 XML 文档的 。

span.span: An used to write the XML document.

param.name: graph
param.span: 要序列化的对象。

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: 使用指定的 将对象数据的开始作为开始 XML 元素写入。

span.span: Writes the start of the object's data as an opening XML element using the specified .

exception.span: 正在序列化的类型不符合数据协定规则。

span.span: the type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules.

exception.span: 例如， 特性未应用于该类型。

span.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

exception.span: 正在序列化的实例有问题。

span.span: there is a problem with the instance being serialized.

exception.span: 已超出要序列化的对象的最大数量。

span.span: the maximum number of objects to serialize has been exceeded.

exception.span: 请检查 属性。

span.span: Check the property.
